Heutzutage wird es immer üblicher, auch Live-Cooking-Strecken in ein Buffet einzubauen um

öfter auch Teilbuffets eingerichtet. So finden sich die Vorspeisen auf dem einen Buffet, die

Bereiche. Der Vorteil dieser dezentralen Anordnung liegt auf der Hand...die Gäste verteilen
sich besser und es gibt weniger Schlangenbildung.

Table. Instead of the food being served at the guest's seat, the guest will serve himself
at a buffet. The guest can put together his own menu as he wishes.
Nowadays, it is becoming increasingly common to incorporate live cooking stations into a buffet in order to raise
the event character and the freshness of the food. Also the set up of
partial buffets is more and more increasing. The starters are served on one buffet, the
soup on another table, the main courses and dessert also have their own
areas. The advantage of this decentralized arrangement is obvious...the guests are distributed
better and there are fewer queues.
A classic buffet is made up of different tables or table tops. It
